trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref href="System.Printing.PrintDriver"></xref> property (and its value) of a printing system hardware or software component.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintDriverProperty"></xref> class for the specified property.
The `attributeName` should be spelled exactly the same as the name of some particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintDriver> property of a print system object, including casing.
For example, the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.QueueDriver%2A> property of a <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> object must be spelled "QueueDriver", not "PrintDriver" or "Queuedriver".
The name of the <xref href="System.Printing.PrintDriver"></xref> property that the <xref href="System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintDriverProperty"></xref> represents.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintDriverProperty"></xref> class that has the specified value for the specified attribute.
The `attributeName` should be spelled exactly the same as the name of some particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintDriver> property of a print system object, including casing.
For example, the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.QueueDriver%2A> property of a <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> object must be spelled "QueueDriver", not "PrintDriver" or "Queuedriver".
The name of the <xref href="System.Printing.PrintDriver"></xref> property that the <xref href="System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintDriverProperty"></xref> represents.
The value of the property that the <xref href="System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintDriverProperty"></xref> represents.
Gets or sets the value of the property that the <xref href="System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintDriverProperty"></xref> represents.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that can be cast to a <xref href="System.Printing.PrintDriver"></xref>.
